00028 // ATMEGA/AVR platform dependent "stuff"
00029 
00030 #ifndef __PLAT_DEP_H__
00031 #define __PLAT_DEP_H__
00032 
00033 #include "mos.h"
00034 
00035 // 4k + 256 memory mapped IO at beginning
00037 #define MEMORY_SIZE  (4096+256)
00038 #define ARCH_PROGMEM PROGMEM
00039 
00040 #define TSLICE_CNTRLA TCCR1A
00041 #define TSLICE_CNTRLB TCCR1B
00042 #define TSLICE_FLAG   OCF1A
00043 #define TSLICE_CNT    TCNT1
00044 #define TSLICE_INT    OCIE1A
00045 #define TSLICE_OCR    OCR1A
00046 #define TSLICE_SIG    SIG_OUTPUT_COMPARE1A
00047 
00048 #define SLEEP_CNTRL TCCR0
00049 #define SLEEP_INT   OCIE0
00050 #define SLEEP_OCR   OCR0
00051 #define SLEEP_CNT   TCNT0
00052 #define SLEEP_FLAG  OCF0
00053 #define SLEEP_SIG   SIG_OUTPUT_COMPARE0
00054 
00055 #define SOFT_INT_SIG SIG_INTERRUPT7
00056 
00057 #define TRIGGER_INT_BIT 7 //which user interrupt to use to trigger dispatcher
00058                           //NOTE: if you change this you must change signal handler
00059                           //ex: SIGNAL(INTx)
00060 
00061 #define SETUP_SOFT_INT()                          \
00062    EIMSK |= (1 << TRIGGER_INT_BIT);               \
00063    EICRB &= ~(0x3 << (TRIGGER_INT_BIT - 4) * 2);  \
00064    DDRE |= (1 << TRIGGER_INT_BIT)
00065 #define DISABLE_SOFT_INT() PORTE |= (1 << TRIGGER_INT_BIT)
00066 #define DO_SOFT_INT() PORTE &= ~(1 << TRIGGER_INT_BIT)
00067 
00068 // in order to wake from sleep mode the timer must be async
00069 #define WAIT_FOR_ASYNC_UPDATE() \
00070       while ((ASSR & (1 << OCR0UB)) || (ASSR & (1 << TCN0UB)));
00071 
00072 // stack pointer type
00073 typedef uint8_t stackval_t;
00074 
00075 // size of the SR -- used for mos_(enable|disable)_ints();
00076 typedef uint8_t handle_t;
00077 
00078 // minimum stack size
00079 #define PLAT_STACK_MIN 64
00080 
00081 #define ENABLE_INTS() sei()
00082 #define DISABLE_INTS() cli()
00083 
00084 #define PLAT_INIT() do {                                                \
00085       WDTCR = (1 << WDCE) | (1 << WDE); /*disable watchdog timer*/      \
00086       WDTCR = 0x00;                                                     \
00087       MCUCSR |= (1 << JTD); /*disable on-chip debugging*/               \
00088    } while(0);
00089 
00090 // timeslicing macros
00091 #define DISABLE_TSLICE_TIMER() TIMSK &= ~(1 << TSLICE_INT)
00092 #define ENABLE_TSLICE_TIMER() TIMSK |= (1 << TSLICE_INT)
00093 #define TSLICE_TIMER_VALUE TSLICE_CNT
00094 // avr doesn't need to double check why an int. occurred.
00095 #define TSLICE_TIMER_EXPIRED (1)
00096 
00097 #define SET_TSLICE_TIMER_VALUE(value) TSLICE_CNT = value
00098 #define SET_TSLICE_OCR_VALUE(value) TSLICE_OCR = value
00099 
00100 #define PRE_KERNEL_SLEEP() SFIOR |= (1 << PUD); // disable all pull-ups
00101 #define POST_KERNEL_SLEEP() SFIOR &= ~(1 << PUD); // re-enable the pull-ups
00102 
00103 // sleep timer macros
00104 #define DISABLE_SLEEP_TIMER() TIMSK &= ~(1 << SLEEP_INT)
00105 #define ENABLE_SLEEP_TIMER() TIMSK |= (1 << SLEEP_INT)
00106 #define SET_SLEEP_TIMER_VALUE(value) SLEEP_CNT = value
00107 #define SET_SLEEP_OCR_VALUE(value) SLEEP_OCR = value;
00108 // avr doesn't need to double check why an int. occurred.
00109 #define SLEEP_TIMER_EXPIRED (1)
00110 
00111 // set sleep enabled, modes for sleep mode
00112 #define ENABLE_SLEEP()                                  \
00113    MCUCR |= (1 << SE) | (1 << SM1) | (1 << SM0);        \
00114    MCUCR &= ~(1 << SM2);
00115 
00116 // set sleep enable, modes for idle mode
00117 #define ENABLE_IDLE()                                   \
00118    MCUCR |= (1 << SE);                                  \
00119    MCUCR &= ~((1 << SM2) | (1 << SM1) | (1 << SM0));                
00120 
00121 // perform sleep/idle
00122 #define SLEEP() asm volatile("sleep\n")
00123 #define IDLE() asm volatile("sleep\n")
00124 
00125 #define SLEEP_INT_HEADER() SIGNAL(SLEEP_SIG)
00126 #define TSLICE_INT_HEADER() SIGNAL(TSLICE_SIG)
00127 #define SOFT_INT_HEADER() SIGNAL(SOFT_INT_SIG)
00128 //extern uint16_t last_sleep_time;
00129 
00133 void kernel_timer_init(void);
00134 
00138 void sleep_timer_init(void);
00139 
00143 #define mos_enable_ints(int_handle) (SREG = int_handle)
00144 
00148 handle_t mos_disable_ints(void);
00149

00151 #define GET_SP(sp)              \
00152     asm volatile(               \
00153         "in %A0, __SP_L__\n\t"  \
00154         "in %B0, __SP_H__\n\t"  \
00155         : "=r" (sp) : )         \
00156 
00157 #endif
